com.jgaap.gui.dnd
Class CanonicizerLabel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JLabel
                  com.jgaap.gui.dnd.CanonicizerLabel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.dnd.DragSourceMotionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class CanonicizerLabel
extends javax.swing.JLabel
implements java.awt.dnd.DragSourceMotionListener

This class is intended to be both a visual and model layer for representing Canonicizers visually in the JGAAP GUI.

Author:
Chuck Liddell
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

CanonicizerLabel

public CanonicizerLabel(DnDManager dndManager,
                        Canonicizer canonicizer,
                        CanonicizerLabelPanel owner,
                        IconGlassPane glassPane,
                        java.awt.Color color)
Small icon, no text constructor that accepts color as an instance of java.awt.Color.

Parameters:
dndManager - DnDManager instance that we will pass drag / drop results to
canonicizer - Canonicizer linked to this label
owner - CanonicizerLabelPanel responsible for transferring this label
color - Color used to render Canonicizer icon

CanonicizerLabel

public CanonicizerLabel(DnDManager dndManager,
                        Canonicizer canonicizer,
                        CanonicizerLabelPanel owner,
                        IconGlassPane glassPane,
                        java.awt.Color color,
                        java.lang.String text)
Large icon with text constructor, accepts color as an instance of java.awt.Color.

Parameters:
dndManager - DnDManager instance that we will pass drag / drop results to
canonicizer - Canonicizer linked to this label
color - Color used to render Canonicizer icon
owner - CanonicizerLabelPanel responsible for transferring this label
text - Text to display next to the Canonicizer icon

CanonicizerLabel

public CanonicizerLabel(CanonicizerLabel toCopy)
Copy constructor, to break references when needed. Note: This constructor always produce a small icon, no text instance.

Parameters:
toCopy - The label to get data from

CanonicizerLabel

public CanonicizerLabel(CanonicizerLabel toCopy,
                        CanonicizerLabelPanel owner)
Copy constructor that accepts a new CanonicizerLabelPanel reference. Note: This constructor always produce a small icon, no text instance.

Parameters:
toCopy - The label to get data from
owner - A CanonicizerLabelPanel to replace the old one
Method Detail

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
Compare two CanonicizerLabel instances for equality. CanonicizerLabels are considered equal if their related Canonicizers have the same display name.

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object

public java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable createTransferable()
